 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתִי‎</span><sub>8</sub> **noun masculine** ==warp== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — always <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> absolute; — ***warp***, the set of threads drawn lengthwise in loom, through which the shuttle bearing the woof (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵרֶב‎</span>) is thrown crosswise; [[Lev.13.48|Lev 13:48]] + 7 t. [[Lev.13|Lev 13]] compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>PAOS, Oct. 1889, cixxviii</sup> [[BDB#Kennedy|ARSK]]<sup>EB WEAVING</sup>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתוֺת‎</span> see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁת‎</span>] below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁית‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִם‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַיִם‎</span> below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁנה‎</span>.
